title: Generative AI Integration Strategies in Higher Education: Enhancing Instructional Designersâ€™ Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and general understanding of educational technology (EdTech)
context.additional_context: Practice-Oriented Course Focusing on Educational Design and Ethical Problem-Solving Using Generative AI Tools (e.g., ChatGPT, DALL-E). Hybrid Operation: Online (Theory) + Offline (Workshop)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain core functionalities of generative AI tools and their application cases in higher education.
Learners can develop and demonstrate step-by-step strategies for integrating generative AI into the instructional design process.
Learners can identify ethical issues arising in AI-assisted education and propose solutions.
Learners can design and evaluate generative AI-based educational materials for instructor-learner collaboration.

resources: Instructional Design Template for Case Analysis

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
